CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.4.k.9, drugparadministration (3N)
E2B (R3): G.k.4.r.11.1 Route of Administration (free text) Conformance: Optional Data Type: 60 AN OID: None Value Allowed: Free text nullFlavor: ASKU, NASK, UNK
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This section should be used in a parent-child or fetus report and linked to parent reports to indicate the route of administration to the parent.
CustomField.label: Parent Route of Administration
